title: The lovely northern lasse, who in the ditty here complaining, shewes what harme she got milking her daddies ewes. To a pleasant Scotch tune, called, The broom of Cowden knowes.
publisher: Printed for Fr. Coles in the Old-Bayly.,
notes: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Right half of sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
